cpu: ʻO ka lolo o ke kamepiula, hoʻokō i nā kuhikuhi
ho\u02bbomana\u02bbo ho\u02bbopa\u02bba: Hoʻomanaʻo hoʻomanaʻo kahi e mālama ʻia ai nā polokalamu holo a me nā ʻikepili
pa\u02bba pa\u02bbakik\u012b: ʻO ka mea hoʻopaʻa paʻa non-volatile nui me ka hoʻohana ʻana i nā pā magnetic
holo moku pa\u02bba: ʻO ka mālama ʻole-volatile me ka hoʻomanaʻo flash, ʻoi aku ka wikiwiki ma mua o nā HDD
ka\u02bba pahi: Ke ala no ka ʻikepili e hele ai ma waena o nā ʻāpana
mea hookomo: ʻAe ʻia ke komo ʻana i ka ʻikepili i loko o ke kamepiula (e like me ka papa keyboard, ka ʻiole)
mea ho\u02bbopuka: Hōʻike i nā hopena i ka mea hoʻohana (e like me ka monitor, printer)
motherboard: ʻO ka papa kaapuni nui e hoʻopili ai i nā ʻāpana āpau o ke kamepiula
p\u016bnaewele kamepiula: He hōʻiliʻili o nā mea pili i hiki ke kaʻana like i nā kumuwaiwai
ip address: He mea hōʻike helu kūʻokoʻa i hāʻawi ʻia i kēlā me kēia mea hana ma kahi pūnaewele
bandwidth: ʻO ka palena kiʻekiʻe o ka hoʻoili ʻikepili ma kahi ala pūnaewele
ka l\u014d\u02bbihi: ʻO ka lohi o ka manawa no ka hele ʻana o ka ʻikepili mai kahi kumu a i kahi e hele ai
